summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1590, for the improvement of Sixth Avenue Northeast and Seventh Avenue Northeast, from the north line of East Forty-fifth Street to the south lien of East Fiftieth Street; and Forty-seventh Street, from Sixth Avenue Northeast to Seventh Avenue Northeast, by grading and constructing cement sidewalks, under Ordinance No. 16885 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
